title: Visual Thinking-Based Science Escape Game: Higher Education Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental grasp of scientific theories and basic understanding of experimental procedures
context.additional_context: Learners who are current practitioners collaborate using digital devices and improve problem-solving skills through escape games linked to real scientific problems

learning_goals: Learners can analyze given scientific problems with visual thinking tools to derive a logical solution path of three or more steps.
Learners can collaborate with team members to complete five or more mission stages of an escape game within 60 minutes.
Learners can apply the scientific thinking process acquired during the escape game to real-world work scenarios.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
